thread.title: Sloane Stephens’s Puzzling Slump

author: Tom Perrotta
title: Sloane Stephens’s Puzzling Slump
text:
American Sloane Stephens defied expectations last season with a strong summer capped by the U.S. Open title, the first Grand Slam championship of her career. She won tight matches. She won a third-set tiebreaker. And in the final, she dominated, losing just three games.
It’s tennis season again and for the women, the outcomes continue to be improbable. Take Stephens, who is currently staging one of the most disastrous encores to a major title in memory.
...
